statements.__comment: This analyze AWS accounts we created and tag the ones that are foreign. Foreign accounts are ones that were not in the sync scope
statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]-> (foreign:AWSAccount) where NOT EXISTS(foreign.inscope) SET foreign.foreign = true

statements.__comment: Remove accounts that were set with foreign and inscope. This can happen as we finish the list of sync accounts through assume role mapping and vpc peering
statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(a:AWSAccount) where EXISTS(a.inscope) AND EXISTS(a.foreign) REMOVE a.foreign
